thread.title: BRIEF-G-III Apparel Group Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01

title: BRIEF-G-III Apparel Group Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01
text: March 22, 2018 / 11:53 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-G-III Apparel Group Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01 Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - G-Iii Apparel Group Ltd: * G-III APPAREL GROUP, LTD. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.26 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.17 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2019 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.98 TO $2.08 * SEES Q1 2019 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.02 TO $0.12 * Q4 SALES $715 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $707.5 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.02, REVENUE VIEW $582.7 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.13, REVENUE VIEW $3.09 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.90 TO $2.00 * SEES Q1 LOSS PER SHARE BETWEEN $0.04 AND $0.14 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
